body: Ok. Spoke to the lawyers. They want the learn more link to point to the Privacy Policy like the others do. Mika is working on a new Privacy Policy that has bits in it for Shield Studies. If that is live when we hit release, we are good to go. If that is not live, we can update the existing privacy policy. I've already let them know that we need this done by end of quarter, so they'll let us know which option we are rolling with.
